name: The Third Eye of the Gazelle
name_original: The Third Eye of the Gazelle
description:
"First Prize" winner at the Neuro Game Jam (2018), organized by The Champalimaud Foundation.
Created by Isaque Sanches and Eva Vital.

The Third Eye of The Gazelle is a 1v1 local multiplayer game about self-confidence and gaslighting.
Players are rewarded not only by their in-game performance but also by correctly asserting who is responsible for past mistakes (which is deliberately unreadable during play). 
From a scientific point of view, the goal of this experiment was to attempting to track players' confidence regarding their performance relatively to their opponent.
